text: Saufatu Sopoanga (22 February 1952 - 17 December 2020) was a Tuvaluan politician. He was the 8th Prime Minister of Tuvalu from 2 August 2002 until 27 August 2004. Sopoanga was born in Nukufetau, Tuvalu. Sopoanga died on 17 December 2020 at the age of 68. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of Tuvalu
title: Saufatu Sopoanga
